DOC.detailed_description: The study carry two phase . Phase one ( 4 week ) focus evaluate usability Novus system . Phase two ( 8 week ) enable continued clinical follow . The study include sixteen ( 16 ) subject suffer foot drop thigh muscle weakness due upper motor neuron injury disease ; eight ( 8 ) subject new user Functional Electrical Stimulation ( FES ) experience eight ( 8 ) experience Ness L300/Ness L300 Plus user . Phase two study include new user . The primary objective study evaluate usability Novus system among patient gain subject ' feedback regard device use daily basis . The secondary objective obtain information performance system gait assistive device evaluate subject 's Quality Life use system . System usability evaluate adapted 5 point Likert scale usability questionnaire patient 's feedback questionnaire . Quality life ( QoL ) measure Participation scale questionnaire functional ambulation assessment ; modify Emory Functional Ambulation Profile ( mEFAP ) perform without system 2 minute walk test ( 2MWT ) without system .
